name: FRIENDS OF THE FALLS
description: Nonprofit seeking to transform the Upper St. Anthony Falls lock in Minneapolis
sampleDescriptions: Partial disposition by the US Army Corps of Engineers of real property at the Upper St. Anthony Falls Lock and Dam and conveyance to the city of Minneapolis.
